title: Family of U.N. Expert Critical of Israel Sues Trump Over Sanctions
summary_full: The family of Francesca Albanese, a critic of Israel’s war in Gaza, asked a court to void the Trump administration’s sanctions against her.
summary_public: The family of Francesca Albanese, a critic of Israel’s war in Gaza, asked a court to void the Trump administration’s sanctions against her.

IL.label: neutral
IL.evidence: critic of Israel’s war in Gaza
